# Results

---
---


Here I show the results from @tbl-mtcars and a regression from [@fig-mpg-hp-cyl]: I estimate

$$y_i = \beta_0 + \beta_1 x_i + \varepsilon_i$$

::: {#tbl-reg1 .cell tbl-cap='Regression table 1'}

Error & 3.173 (df = 29) \\  F Statistic & 41.422$^{***}$ (df = 2; 29) \\  \hline  \hline \\[-1.8ex]  \textit{Note:}  & \multicolumn{1}{r}{$^{*}$p$<$0.1; $^{**}$p$<$0.05; $^{***}$p$<$0.01} \\  \end{tabular}  \end{table}
